name: Goblin Dodger
description:
Goblin Dodger is a singleplayer survival game where your goal is to survive as many waves of goblins as you can. 

If you get overwhelmed you can use your holy blast to destroy all goblins on screen. But be careful, your holy powers hurt you and your score as well!

Pick up health potions when you're running low on HP.

Now get out there and (don't) fight those goblins!

Controls:

This game was made for the Trijam #168 game jam. 

Theme: Don't hurt nobody!

How it was implemented: The knight needs to survive the goblins as long as he can but sometimes he will get overwhelmed. In a pinch he can use a holy blast to get rid of all the goblins on the screen at the cost of his score and some of his health. This incentivizes dodging and weaving instead of blasting your way through.
